logs.message:
Thank you! I'm glad the minesweeper game is working well. The project is now fully functional with:

✅ Complete game mechanics (mine placement, cell revealing, flagging)
✅ Difficulty levels (Easy, Medium, Hard)
✅ Timer and mine counter
✅ Win/loss detection with confetti celebration
✅ Clean, responsive UI with Tailwind CSS
✅ Smooth animations and hover effects

The game is running on http://localhost:5173 and ready to play. Is there anything else you'd like me to add or modify? Some ideas:
- High score tracking
- Custom difficulty settings
- Sound effects
- Mobile touch controls optimization
- Different themes/color schemes

Let me know if you'd like any enhancements!
